snippet.title: Songs of Steel: Hispania | Official Launch Trailer ⚔️
snippet.description:
#videogame #strategygame #pcgamer 

⚔️ Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2603300/Songs_of_Steel_Hispania/

The full game is now available on Steam! Enjoy both campaigns: conquer the Iberian Peninsula commanding the mighty Roman army or fight alongside your warrior brothers to defend your homeland with the brave Celtiberian tribes.

Experience beautifully hand-drawn art, traditional turn-based strategy gameplay, and engaging combat tactics. 

Join the battle and make history in "Songs of Steel: Hispania"!

Follow us on social media:
🔸https://twitter.com/songsofsteelvg
🔸https://www.instagram.com/songsofsteelvg
🔸https://www.tiktok.com/@songsofsteelvg

Produced and Published by Combat Time and Developed by Meteorbyte.
